item.description:
Finally - let's go to the Coast Guard house for brunch !!! I wanted to wait til after Labor Day to schedule this one to avoid summer traffic.

NOTE - I've changed the brunch tiime to NOON (from 11:00am)

Looks great and a lot of members have suggested this restaurant.

They serve a brunch buffet for $23.95 per person

Sunday Brunch Menu

Bloody Mary or Mimosa
Breakfast Sausage
Home Fries
Corned Beef Hash
Scrambled Eggs Florentine
Baked Beans

Baked Chicken
Beef Stroganoff over egg noodles
Baked Fish Filets (seasonal selection)
Rice Pilaf
Fresh Vegetable

Pasta Station
Tortellini Carbonara
Penne pepperoni marinara
Gemellini pesto grilled vegetables

French Toast
Omelets
Eggs Benedict

Belgian Waffles
Assorted Flamed Crepes
Apple Crisp
Mousse
Fruited Jello

Mini Muffins
Apple Turnovers
Scones
Bagels
Biscuits

Assorted Fresh Salads

Orange, Cranberry, Grapefruit Juice
Coffee, Tea
Espresso, Cappuccino, International Coffees
and a variety of Teas available

Check them out here:


http://www.thecoastgu...
item.name: September Brunch - Coast Guard House in Narragansett
